name: Black Elk Manor
description:
Welcome to the Black Elk Manor! Don't get too spooked and remember to use locked doors to your advantage.

This game was made for the My First Game Jam: Winter 2021 Submissions.

Hint: If you're immediately stuck, you can take keys out of open doors and reuse them elsewhere! The black portals take all your keys away.

Known bug:

The enemies will go at supersonic speeds if you have a refresh rate higher than 60 hz. If you have  a second monitor that goes at a lower speed you can drag the window over, or if you lower your refresh rate to 60 or 59 hz it will fix the bug.
